LanguageData.Deeprim.NoPowerDesc: Allows digging deep into the planet for exploration and mining. Requires a miner.
LanguageData.Deeprim.PowerDesc: Allows digging deep into the planet for exploration and mining. Requires power.
LanguageData.Deeprim.Lowtech.Tooltip: Changes the drill to use manually without power and changes the construction cost
LanguageData.Deeprim.GeneratingMap: Drilling is complete, generating new map. This may take a while depending on the map-size used.
LanguageData.Deeprim.DecreasePowerTT: Lowers the extra power transferred to lower layers to {0}W. This is not counting the 1000W transferred when the drill is not currently drilling. Power is split equal between connected layers.
LanguageData.Deeprim.IncreasePowerTT: Increases the extra power transferred to lower layers to {0}W. This is not counting the 1000W transferred when the drill is not currently drilling. Power is split equal between connected layers.
LanguageData.Deeprim.SendDownTT: Send everything on the elevator down the shaft
LanguageData.Deeprim.BringUpTT: Bring everything on the elevator up to the surface
LanguageData.Deeprim.ConfirmAbandonAgain: Click again to confirm. Once abandoned, everything in that layer is lost forever!
LanguageData.Deeprim.ConfirmAbandonTT: This action is irreversible!!! If this is the only shaft to it, everything currently on that layer shall be lost forever, without any way of getting them back.
LanguageData.Deeprim.AbandonTT: Abandon the layer. If there's no more shafts connected to it, all pawns and items in it is lost forever.
LanguageData.Deeprim.PauseDrillingTT: Temporary pause drilling. Progress are kept.
LanguageData.Deeprim.StartDrillingNewTT: Start drilling down to find a new suitable mining area.
LanguageData.Deeprim.StartDrillingExistingTT: Start drilling down towards existing mining area.
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTransferTargetTT: Toggle target for nearby storage. Currently, transfer is set to depth: {0}
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTargetNewTT: Toggle target between new layer and old layers. Currently, mining shaft is set to dig new layer.
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTargetExistingTT: Toggle target between new layer and old layers. Currently, mining shaft is set to old layer, depth: {0}
